# CKAccountStatus.restricted

**Case**

The system denies access to the user’s iCloud account.

## Declaration

```swift
case restricted
```

## Discussion

Your app can’t access the user’s iCloud account due to restrictions that Parental Controls or Mobile Device Management impose.

## Account Statuses

- **CKAccountStatus.available**: The user’s iCloud account is available.
- **CKAccountStatus.couldNotDetermine**: CloudKit can’t determine the status of the user’s iCloud account.
- **CKAccountStatus.noAccount**: The device doesn’t have an iCloud account.
- **CKAccountStatus.temporarilyUnavailable**: The user’s iCloud account is temporarily unavailable.
